actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department, Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to make permanent the exclusion for certain service performed on fishing boats from coverage from unemployment compensation tax.

summary.text: Amends the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 to make permanent the exemption from Federal unemployment tax of service performed on certain fishing vessels.

titles.title: A bill to make permanent the exclusion for certain service performed on fishing boats from coverage from unemployment compensation tax.
